mapper.select: SELECT * FROM REGISTRATION WHERE lectureclass_no = #{lectureclass_no} and student_number = #{student_number}

select rownum rnum, R.*, b.lectureclass_class, to_char(b.lectureclass_start, 'hh24:mi') starttime, to_char(b.lectureclass_end, 'hh24:mi') endtime, b.lecture_title, b.lecture_reference, b.lecture_target, b.lecture_start, b.lecture_end, b.lecture_limit, b.lectureclass_personnel, b.name from registration R join (select * from lectureclass LC join (select * from lecture L join teacher T on L.teacher_number = T.teacher_number) A on LC.lecture_no = A.lecture_no) B on r.lectureclass_no = B.lectureclass_no where student_number = #{student_number} order by rnum desc
